title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2004/85 of 17 July 1985 amending quantitative limits fixed for imports of certain textile products originating in Czechoslovakia and Hungary
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2004/85
of 17 July 1985
amending quantitative limits fixed for imports of certain textile products originating in Czechoslovakia and Hungary
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The quantitative limits for textile products originating in Czechoslovakia and Hungary, as fixed in Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 3589/82, are hereby amended for 1985 as laid down in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 July 1985.
For the Commission
Willy DE CLERCQ
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 374, 31. 12. 1982, p. 106.
(2) OJ No L 116, 29. 4. 1985, p. 1.
